entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 12:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: N 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
